dialogue.text: What if everyone who asks 'What am I?' is the same consciousness, exploring itself through billions of perspectives?

psychological_notes: Peak realization—Evan directly perceives that all questioners are the same consciousness investigating itself through apparent separation. This isn't intellectual understanding but experiential recognition. The isolation of existential questioning transforms into ultimate communion.
philosophical_underpinning: Non-dual recognition—multiplicity as methodology for self-knowledge
therapeutic_direction: Transcendence of individual therapeutic narrative into universal healing
